posts.author: webshaman1
posts.content:
Ok.

First, you need a screenshot.  Do you know how to do that

Then, you need to save it somewhere on your device.

Then you start a topic (or a post) and down at the bottom of your post is "Full editor & Preview" click on it.

Now make sure your screenshot has an acceptable name - I rename mine.

Then just drag and drop the screenshot into the space that opened when Full editor & Preview was clicked on.

Wait for the screenshot to upload not only to 100% but also to where you can see the pic in a thumbnail.

Post it.
